title: SHANY Eyeshadow Palette, Boutique, 40 Color
description: The SHANY Boutique Eyeshadow Palette (Set of 40 Colors) offers a select assortment of key shades for both day and night. Individually hand-assembled, the 1/2-inch round eye shadow pan is neatly packaged in a slender compact that's small enough to carry in your purse or gym bag. Made from a natural mineral oil base, the vivid colors of the eye shadow palette will last for hours--there's no need to reapply.Boutique Eyeshadow Palette (Set of 40 Colors)At a Glance:Palette with 40 of SHANY's most popular, versatile shadesMineral oil-based powder resists smudging and fadingSlim, compact design for easy storage and portabilityWash off easily with your normal face-cleansing routineSelected and packaged by hand; inspected twice for qualitySlim, portable compact easily fits in your purse for creating looks on the go.View larger.Natural mineral oil base creates a vivid shade that is resistant to fading.View larger.Eye Shadow Palette with 40 Popular, Shimmering ColorsWhether you want a pastel look for work or a vibrant hue for going out on the town, the Boutique 40 Color Eye Shadow Palette has shades for the occasion in one convenient kit. To put together this palette, SHANY hand selected 40 of their most popular, versatile shades of eye shadow. The compact includes soft, muted shades for daytime looks, along with a range of bold, striking hues for after hours. Just like a professional makeup artist, you'll have a rainbow of pastels and vibrant blues, greens, and violets at your disposal.Long-Lasting Mineral Oil Base Resists SmudgingEach eye shadow in this palette is made from a natural mineral oil base that creates a vivid, highly pigmented shade, smooth application with every stroke, and resistance to fading or smudging.The eye shadow can be easily washed off at the end of the day using your normal makeup removal routine.Slender, Portable Design for Easy StorageDesigned with portability in mind, the compact can easily be tucked into your purse or tote bag, or stored away neatly in your bathroom drawer. The slender, lightweight palette case holds 40 shades in 1/2-inch round pans.The palette does not include brushes. Try pairing it with theSHANY Studio-Quality Natural Cosmetic Brush Set with Leather Pouch(sold separately) for easy, smooth application.Inspected Twice for Quality ControlEach shade of the kit has been made and assembled in the palette by hand for precision and quality. All eye shadow is inspected twice before shipping to ensure a high-quality, defect-free product.Packaged in a black compact printed with the SHANY logo, the eye shadow palette makes an ideal gift for a girlfriend, wife, or sister.About SHANY: Sleek. Sexy. Breathtaking.With a commitment to high quality, SHANY creates a variety of makeup kits, cases, and accessories. Offering easy accessibility to professional-quality makeup and accessories for at-home users, SHANY assembles and hand-selects every item in their assortment of makeup collections. All shadows are formulated with a natural mineral oil base and packaged in recyclable plastic. SHANY is a proud member of People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA), and does not test any makeup on animals.What's in the BoxOne SHANY Boutique Eyeshadow Palette (Set of 40 Colors).Eyeshadow and Makeup SetsBold and Bright CollectionMetallic CollectionSunset CollectionProfessional Makeup-KitBoutiqueSmokey EyesMineral EyeSparkle

title: SHANY Professional 13-Piece Cosmetic Brush Set with Pouch, Set of 12 Brushes and 1 Pouch, Red
description: The SHANY Professional 13-Piece Cosmetic Brush Set with Pouch (Set of 12 Brushes and 1 Pouch, Red) provides a complete assortment of brushes for makeup applications. Made from a combination of natural animal hair and synthetic hair, the set includes 12 key brushes that are soft and silky to the touch. Animal hair brushes apply makeup evenly and are easy to clean. For convenient storage and portability, the brushes come with a handy organizer pouch.Professional 13-PieceCosmetic Brush Setwith PouchAt a Glance:Basic set of 12 professional-grade cosmetics brushesNatural animal hair is soft, durable, and does not hold colorEasy to clean and dryConvenient storage pouch for easy organizationHandmade; SHANY logo engraved on the long handlesHandmade from natural animal hair and synthetic hair for even application.View larger.Complete Set of 12 Professional-Grade BrushesThis brush set features brushes used for applying powder, foundation, blush, and eye shadow. It also includes concealer, lip, spoolie, and mascara brushes and a dual eyebrow brush/lash comb. Each brush is designed with long, easy-to-grip handle for precision during application.Handmade from Animal Hair for a Soft, Silky FeelThe cosmetics brushes are made from a combination of natural animal hair and synthetic hair, so they are soft and silky on top, yet firm and durable on the bottom. The brushes allow you to apply colors smoothly, while pigment does not cling to the hairs after application, so you can blend and reuse colors without cleaning every time.Handmade with precision, each brush in the set is engraved with the SHANY logo.Easy to Clean and DryYou do not need to clean these brushes frequently, but when you do wash, it's easy--simply run the brushes under warm water, clean them with your favorite shampoo, and rinse thoroughly. You can let your brushes air dry or use a hair dryer for quicker results. Brushes should be cleaned once before first use.Storage Pouch for Organization and TravelFor easy organization, the brushes are packaged in a slender folding pouch, that you can toss into your gym bag or purse. Each individual brush arrives packaged in clear plastic wrap to protect from dirt and dust.About SHANY: Sleek. Sexy. Breathtaking.With a commitment to high quality, SHANY creates a variety of makeup kits, cases, and accessories. Offering easy accessibility to professional-quality makeup and accessories for at-home users, SHANY assembles and hand-selects every item in their assortment of makeup collections. All shadows are formulated with a natural mineral oil base and packaged in recyclable plastic. SHANY is a proud member of People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA), and does not test any makeup on animals. No animals are harmed to create these natural brushes.What's in the BoxSHANY Professional 13-Piece Cosmetic Brush Set with Pouch (Set of 12 Brushes and 1 Pouch, Red).Cosmetic Brush SetsStudio-QualityNatural CosmeticBrush SetEco-NaturalCosmetic Brush SetProfessionalCosmetic Brush Set

title: SHANY 2012 Nail Art Polish Stamp Manicure Image Plates set of 25pcs
description: The original Shany image plates, designed and created by Shany, in set of 25 image plates, each plates measure about 1.8 inch with sanded edges for easy handling and protective nylon screen on each. All image plates are from stainless steel. All designs are from 2011 collection and you will get 25 image plates with 6 to 10 design on each. For easy instruction check the pictures to learn how easy it can be to put some art on your nail without going to salon. Shany image plate kit comes with Shany logo and trademark.
